descriptionHtml:
[size=6]Description

[size=5]Ahkrin is a Nightingale follower that can be found sitting on a bench next to the shrine of Talos in Witherun.Ahkrin is armed with a [/size][/size][size=6][size=5][url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Nightingale_Blade]Nightingale Blade[/url][/size][/size][size=5] a [/size][url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Ebony_Dagger_%28Skyrim%29][size=5]Ebony Dagger[/size][/url][size=5] and a [/size][url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Nightingale_Bow][size=5]Nightingale Bow[/size][/url][size=5].

[size=6]Ahkrin[/size][/size] [size=6]Skills

[size=5]One-Handed[/size] 100
[size=5]Two-Handed 15
Archery - 100
Block - 100
Smithing - 20
Heavy Armor - 100
Light armor - 100
Pickpocket - 15
Lockpicking - 15
Sneak - 100
Alchemy - 15
Speech - 20
All Magic - 15

[size=6][size=5]Ahkrin[/size][/size] skills are suppose to upgrade like a normal player although some glitches may occur making it impossible

[size=6]Requirements

[size=5]-Skyrim.esm
-Update.esm[/size]

Â  [/size][/size]Ahkrin[/size]

[size=6][size=5]Ahkrin[/size][/size] [size=5]means courage in dragon language
[/size]
[size=6]Known bugs and glitches
-[size=6][size=5]Ahkrin[/size][/size] [/size][size=5]may not appear or appear without any items
Patched V2.0
-[size=6][size=5]Ahkrin[/size][/size] may not be able to be your follower
To fix this please open up your console and type : help "Ahkrin" 0 and than with the ID gave to you type: player.placeatme ("ID HERE") 1
-[size=6][size=5]Ahkrin[/size][/size] skills may not proceed as it should[/size]
author: Zenistar
